price: (64) Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
